comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: Praise ye the Savior for His deep compassion, graciously caring for His chosen people; young men and maidens, ye old men and children, praise to the Savior!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Praise ye the Spirit, Comforter of Israel, sent from the Father and the Son to bless us; praise to the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit! Praise to the triune God!
